original: kāntas te puruṣottamaḥ phaṇipatiḥ śayyāsanaṃ vāhanaṃ vedātmā vihageśvaro yavanikā māyā jaganmohinī /
analyzed: kāntaḥ te puruṣottamaḥ phaṇipatiḥ śayyā āsanam vāhanam veda ātmā vihaga īśvaraḥ yavanikā māyā jagat mohinī

original: brahmādisuravrajaḥ sadayitas tvaddāsadāsīgaṇaḥ śrīr ity eva ca nāma te bhagavati /
analyzed: brahma ādi sura vrajaḥ sa dayitaḥ tvad dāsa dāsī gaṇaḥ śrīḥ iti eva ca nāma te bhagavati

original: yasyās te mahimānam ātmana iva tvadvallabho 'pi prabhur nālaṃ mātum iyattayā niravadhiṃ nityānukūlaṃ svataḥ /
analyzed: yasyāḥ te mahimānam ātmanaḥ iva prabhuḥ na alam mātum iyat tayā niravadhim nitya anukūlam svatas

original: prapanna iti ca stoṣyāmy ahaṃ nirbhayo lokaikeśvari lokanāthadayite dānte dayāṃ te vidan // YCs_2 //
analyzed: prapannaḥ iti ca stoṣyāmi aham nirbhayaḥ loka eka īśvari loka nātha dayite dānte dayām te vidan

original: śreyo tvatkaruṇānirīkṣaṇasudhāsandhukṣaṇād rakṣyate naṣṭaṃ prāk tadalābhas tribhuvanaṃ saṃpraty anantodayam /
analyzed: śreyo tvad karuṇā nirīkṣaṇa sudhā sandhukṣaṇāt rakṣyate naṣṭam prāk tad alābhaḥ tribhuvanam saṃprati ananta udayam

original: śreyo na hy aravindalocanamanaḥkāntāprasādād ṛte saṃsṛtyakṣaravaiṣṇavādhvasu nṛṇāṃ saṃbhāvyate karhicit // YCs_3 //
analyzed: śreyaḥ na hi aravinda locana manaḥ kāntā prasādāt ṛte saṃsṛti akṣara vaiṣṇava adhvasu nṛṇām saṃbhāvyate karhicit

original: śāntānantamahāvibhūti paraṃ yad brahma rūpaṃ harer mūrtaṃ brahma tato 'pi tat priyataraṃ rūpaṃ yad atyadbhutam /
analyzed: śānta ananta mahā vibhūti param yat brahma rūpam hareḥ mūrtam brahma tatas tat priyataram rūpam yat ati adbhutam

original: yāny anyāni yathāsukhaṃ viharato rūpāṇi sarvāṇi tāny āhuḥ svair anurūparūpavibhavair gāḍhopagūḍhāni te // YCs_4 //
analyzed: yāni anyāni yathāsukham viharataḥ rūpāṇi sarvāṇi tāni āhuḥ svaiḥ anurūpa rūpa vibhavaiḥ gāḍha upagūḍhāni te
